title: N=2 supersymmetric W-algebras
abstract: We investigate extensions of the N=2 super Virasoro algebra by one additional super primary field and its charge conjugate. Using a supersymmetric covariant formalism we construct all N=2 super W-algebras up to spin 5/2 of the additional generator. Led by these first examples we close with some conjectures on the classification of N=2 ${\cal SW}(1,\Dt)$ algebras.
